Class TDDTCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • tddt.TDDTCompiler

  • public class TDDTCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the interaction between the kata API and TDDT.
    Version:
    unknown
    Author:
    Dominik Kuhnen

    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public boolean compile(java.lang.String code,
                       boolean isTest,
                       java.lang.String classname)
        Tests if code is compilable.
        Parameters:
        code - The compiled code
        isTest - Boolean 'hint' if the code is a test or not.
        classname - The classname of the code.
        Returns:
        True if the code is compilable.

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        Returns:
        Compile errors.

      • compileCode

        private boolean compileCode(java.lang.String code,
                            java.lang.String className)
        Compiles the passed code and sets info to compile errors if there are any.
        Parameters:
        code - The code that is going to be compiled
        className - The classname of the code
        Returns:
        True if the code is compilable. Otherwise false.

      • compileAndRunTests

        private boolean compileAndRunTests(java.lang.String code,
                                   java.lang.String className)
        Compiles and runs the passed test and sets info to any error that may have occured.
        Parameters:
        code - The code that is going to be compiled
        className - The classname of the code
        Returns:
        True if the test is compile- and runnable. Otherwise false.

      • findClassName

        @Deprecated
private java.lang.String findClassName(java.lang.String text)
        Deprecated. 
        This was used to determine the classname in a former version. Not used any longer.
        Parameters:
        text - The class code.
        Returns:
        The classname.

      • formatCompileErrors

        private java.lang.String formatCompileErrors(vk.core.api.CompilerResult cr,
                                             vk.core.api.CompilationUnit cu)
        This formats any compile errors.
        Parameters:
        cr - The CompilerResult of the uncompilable class.
        cu - The CompilationUnit of the uncompilable class.
        Returns:
        A String that contains all the errors.

      • formatFailingTests

        private java.lang.String formatFailingTests(vk.core.api.TestResult tr)
        Parameters:
        tr - The testresult of the failed test.
        Returns:
        A String that contains all the errors.
        See Also:
        formatCompileErrors(CompilerResult, CompilationUnit)
